content.rendered:
Dafabet Kenya Review.

Dafabet International, is a Philippine based sports betting company that is now operating in the country. Being an international betting company, it comes with a number of useful features that are appealing to customers. Live betting is one feature of international betting sites that plenty of Kenyans have become fond of. It allows you to follow ongoing matches and be able to place bets. This gives the gambler an opportunity to watch the game and get a better insight on how the match will progress. This is a feature which is present in Dafabet and in addition, the odds given are often higher than those of other betting sites.

Dafabet Kenya at a glance.

Odds – 8/10

Markets Offered – 7/10

Ease of Use – 9/10

Features – 8/10

User Experience – 8/10

Summary.

Dafabet is a unique betting company that avails high quality features including a user friendly website that allows its customers to navigate their way with ease. Also, it is involved in a number of beneficial sponsorship endeavors.

OVERALL

8/10

Homepage

Features

 Sponsorship

Dafabet is involved in a number of sponsorship deals throughout the world. One of their standout sponsorship programs is being the official sponsors of English Premier League side Burnley and championship side Sunderland and Blackburn rovers and Celtic in the Scottish Premiership.

Cash out.

This is one feature that Kenyans have grown to like over the years. This betting option allows you to remove your cash from an ongoing betslip and terminate the outcome of the remaining matches. What this means is that if you placed a multibet of six teams and four of those won, the cash out option allows you to withdraw the money you have accumulated following the win of those four matches and cancel the remaining two matches. This is quite useful, especially when the remaining matches’ outcomes are in doubt.

 Jackpot.

Here at Dafabet, there is a daily jackpot competition availed to members. This event allows you to make 11 correct predictions and you get to walk away with a cash prize of ksh 1,500,000. There are bonuses for those who make 9 correct predictions and above. 

Get more information about helabet.

Games to bet on.

Football.

Tennis.

Rugby.

Cricket.

Basketball.

Baseball.

American Football.

Aussie Rules.

Beach Volleyball.

MMA/Boxing.

Cycling.

Darts.

Futsal.

Golf.

Handball.

Pros.

High odds

Daily jackpot

Affordable jackpot amount to bet on

Cash out

Live betting.

Top betting sites in Kenya

Cons.

Still not popular in the country.

Dafabet Kenya FAQ

How do I Register and deposit Money to Dafabet?

In order to register, all you nee do here is to SMS either of the words (Register, Join Dafa Dafabet, Play or Cheza to 29567. After doing this, you will receive a confirmation message with your pin and web password. From here, all you need to do is go to their site and enter into your account, using your phone number as your username and the password that was sent to you via SMS. In order to deposit money to this site, all you have to do is go to your Mpesa and select on lipa na Mpesa then send money to 290067. From here, you will then receive a confirmation message acknowledging that money has been credited into your account.

How Do I check my balance on Dafabet?

Checking your balance can easily be done in two ways. The first option is by logging in to your account and checking your balance there. The second option involves use of SMS in order to check your balance. This procedure is quite simple, all you have to do is SMS the word ‘Balance’, ‘BA’ or ‘Bal’ to 29567 and you will get a message notification which gives you information on your balance.

How do I join dafabet?

Opening an account in a betting site has never been this easy, all you have to do is log into their website and click on the “Register” option which allows you to key in your personal information as well as your password. From here, your account will be set up and you will be able to place as many bets as you choose.

What is Dafabet Mpesa Paybill number?

Their pay bill number is 290067
